text: My <a href='https://arxiv.org/pdf/2409.17578'>paper/a> on perspectives on privavy and mobile phone data in rural Togo was accepted at <a href=https://cscw.acm.org/2024/'>CSCW/a> (2025)
I will participate in a workshop at the Digital Technology and Sustainable Development Workshop at Oxford University.
I will participate in a public workshop at the White House on Participatory Algorithmic Design.
I will give a talk at Microsoft on expanding perspectives on data privacy based on fieldwork in Togo.
I will start a summer internship with Microsoft's Office AI team working on Copilot.
I will give a talk at the UC Berkeley on expanding perspectives on data privacy based on fieldwork in Togo.
I will co-teach Big Data & Development in Spring 2024.
